page.title: 08MOOR FARM, LANGENHOE
page.content: Most farms in the area are large in size, but there are also some smaller ones, of which{Moor farm}is an example .My Grandad owns{Moor}farm-it has been in the family for 63 years. They sell eggs and some vegtables. And they grow flowers for seed. Wheat is grown on the rest of the land. The lowest land next to the sea wall is drained and only rough grass grows. There is some more low lying marshy land further along the road where the creek finally runs out. Horses sometimes graze there.
